newsitem.title: USA: McLaks remain off menu at McDonald's for now.
newsitem.headline: McLaks remain off menu at McDonald's for now.

text.p: McDonald's Corp., which has withdrawn salmon burgers from its 36 restaurants in Norway after four people became ill, said Thursday it cannot say when it will resume selling the McLaks.
"Until we have better knowledge, we don't want to speculate" when sales of the salmon burgers will resume, said Agnete Samdahl, spokeswoman for McDonald's in Norway.
McDonald's and food health authorities in Norway have been checking the product and "tests to date show no problem," Samdahl said in a telephone interview from Norway.
The McLaks salmon burgers have been sold in Norway for several years.

Last Sunday, two customers and two employees at a McDonald's restaurant in Lorenskog apparently became ill after eating the salmon burgers and were hospitalized. They have since been released, she said.
As a precaution, McDonald's withdrew the product from all of its restaurants in Norway, she said.
